name: unfollow_user
description: Unfollow a user on X/Twitter by navigating to their profile.

steps.code: const unfollowBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid$="-unfollow"]'); if (!unfollowBtn) return { not_following: true, message: 'Not following this user' }; unfollowBtn.click(); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 500)); const confirmBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid="confirmationSheetConfirm"]'); if (confirmBtn) confirmBtn.click(); return { success: true, message: 'Unfollowed user' }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Unfollow user with confirmation
